```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)

bib <- ReadBib("bib.bib")
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", bib.style = "authoryear", cite.style = 'authoryear')
NoCite(bib)
PrintBibliography(bib, .opts = list(check.entries = FALSE, sorting = "ynt"))
```
